description:
A feature-rich desktop native client developed for Windows, MacOS, and Linux platforms, allowing you to enjoy the instant messaging service on your PC.


Important Note
1. The update is expected to be available in all regions within the next few days. The actual time of release may vary slightly depending on the region.
Fixed Issues
1. Fixed a security vulnerability regarding electron-builder (CVE-2024-27303).
2. Improved the user interface layout for different screen resolutions.
3. Optimized user data removal when uninstalling the Chat client for Windows.
